name: The House of Horror Game
description:
You are in a house and someone is watching you. You have to find a key to escape the house.  You can grab batteries for your flashlight while you are aware that someone is trying to catch you.

If you have any other ideas that I could use to improve the game, you can write to me in the comments

Happy Playing :-)

I have created a few games, but this is the first one I´ve done seriously

I  hope you enjoy it.
